entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as catching a doxy with a blast of Doxycide. He is also seen picking up a doxy and throwing it in the bucket.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is described as holding a struggling doxy between his forefinger and thumb. He is also seen spraying a doxy quickly in its face so that it fainted.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is described as telling Harry under his breath about experimenting with doxy venom for their Skiving Snack-boxes. He is also seen spraying two doxies at once.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is described as saying sharply to Fred to spray the doxy and throw it away.

entities.name: doxycide
entities.description: Doxycide is described as a substance that Harry uses to catch a doxy.

entities.name: doxy
entities.description: Doxy is described as an animal with needle-sharp teeth and thick black hair. It is also mentioned as being used for experimenting with venom for Skiving Snack-boxes.

entities.name: skiving snack-boxes
entities.description: Skiving Snack-boxes are described as objects that George and Fred want to experiment with doxy venom for.

relationships.description: Harry uses Doxycide to catch a doxy.
